title: US Natural Gas Hits $6 for First Time Since 2022 on Arctic Blast
description: US natural gas soared above $6 for the first time since 2022 as freezing weather swept across much of the country, boosting heating demand and disrupting supplies.
content: US natural gas soared above $6 for the first time since 2022 as freezing weather swept across much of the country, boosting heating demand and disrupting supplies.
